    • backupDatabase

      public static void backupDatabase(String dbUsername, String dbPassword, String dbName, String outputFile) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Backs up the current database, exporting it as a file
      Parameters:
      dbUsername - holds the database username
      dbPassword - holds the database password
      dbName - holds the database name
      outputFile - holds the backup file
      Throws:
      IOException - exception
      InterruptedException - exception

    • restoreDatabase

      public static void restoreDatabase(String dbUsername, String dbPassword, String dbName, String sourceFile, org.springframework.ui.Model model) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Restores the database from a specified file
      Parameters:
      dbUsername - holds the database username
      dbPassword - holds the database password
      dbName - holds the database name
      sourceFile - holds the sql backup file
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      Throws:
      IOException - exception
      InterruptedException - exception
